titleStmt.title: An act for the inlargement of the periods of time limited in an act for the better execution of His Majesties gracious declaration for the settlement of His kingdom of Ireland, &c.
Public General Acts. 1662. 14 Charles II c.2.
titleStmt.author: Ireland.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Crook, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, and are to be sold by Sam. Dancer,
